title: Financial Reporting in Hyperinflationary Economies (IAS 29) Disclosure Checklist

sections.title: Financial Reporting in Hyperinflationary Economies
sections.description: Checklist for presentation and disclosure requirements under IAS 29.

items.question: Does the entity disclose that the financial statements and the corresponding figures for previous periods have been restated for changes in the general purchasing power of the functional currency and are stated in terms of the measuring unit current at the end of the reporting period?
Does the entity disclose whether the financial statements are based on a historical cost approach or a current cost approach?
Does the entity separately disclose the gain or loss on the net monetary position resulting from the application of IAS 29.27–28?

Does the entity make all necessary disclosures required by IAS 29 to clarify the basis for dealing with the effects of hyperinflation and to provide other information necessary to understand that basis and the resulting amounts?
